text: Malik Risaldi (born in October 23, 1996), is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Liga 1 club Persela Lamongan. ==Career== ===Persela Lamongan=== He was signed for Persela Lamongan to played in Liga 1 on 2019 season. ==References== ==External links== * Malik Risaldi at Liga Indonesia * Malik Risaldi at Soccerway Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Persela Lamongan players Category:Persegres Gresik players
title: Malik Risaldi
